item.description:
Central CT Singles invites you to the Extreme Neon Bowling Party with Half-Price Bowling!

Saturday, January 19 at 8 pm

Bowl 2 games for only $9 (including shoes)

Free Billiards and Darts * Prizes * Drink Specials

Movies on the BIG Screen

A Bowling Ball will be given away to the top score!

Join us for the party and meet local singles at the Legends Lounge:

AMF Bowling Center/Legends Lounge
748 Silver Lane
East Hartford, CT 06118
Phone: (860) 569-2990

We will have music, movies, FREE Billiards and Darts, gift certificates, and prizes!

We will be in the Legends Lounge wearing black CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Clubbers T-Shirts.

RSVP on http://singles.meetup...



Tickets are only $15
$12 online Before January 16

See you at the party!

Jason
Central CT Singles
Membership is FREE, Join Today and meet Local Singles!
www.CentralCTSingles.com
(860) 236-3343

Receive our New Events Email - Click Here

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Central CT Singles Neon Bowling Party with Half-Price Bowling!
